Dark One/Sixshot/Chordate:


"Chordate, here." he replied, "come as fast as you can, weapons should 
provide slight cover fire."

---

Dark One weaved through the mountains, firing off two heat seeking missiles 
at Teltoli.

---

Sixshot weaved in through the rocks, firing off twenty-five laser blasts at 
Windlord.  Sixshot pulled high up, reaching an altitude higher than the 
mountains, his engines going to full power as if he was in space, blasting 
away through the sky.
